firmwares.name: Base-Firmware
firmwares.description: This firmware is for administration and implements no usecase

firmwares.name: LED-Controle
firmwares.description: This firmware enables you to manage a LEDs with MQTT commands.

firmwares.name: Trigger Firmware
firmwares.description: Firmware is based on base firmware, but additionaly listens on mqtt messages and makes gpio output.
